name: Method Acting
description: Your opponent takes 10 damage and discards two random cards.

immediateEffect.script: DealDamage(Opponent, 10); for (int i = 0; i < 2 && OpponentHand.Count > 0; i++) { int idx = Rng.Next(OpponentHand.Count); var discarded = OpponentHand[idx]; OpponentHand.RemoveAt(idx); OpponentDiscard.Add(discarded); Log(OpponentDisplayName + " discards " + discarded.Name + "!"); }
